adrFormatAddress: 71 E 118th St #1, New York, NY 10035, USA

originalText.text:
Collaborating with By Dami Studios, a stationery and gifting company, has been an absolute delight as a wedding planner and our clients.

From the moment we began working together, their team has consistently exceeded expectations, delivering exceptional products and services that truly enhance my clients' wedding experiences.

By Dami Studios brings a unique blend of creativity, attention to detail, and passion to their stationery and gifting offerings. Their ability to understand each couple's vision and translate it into stunning stationery designs and personalized gifts is truly commendable. They take the time to get to know the clients and their preferences, ensuring that every product reflects their individual style and love story.

Working with By Dami Studios has been a seamless and enjoyable experience. Their team is responsive, organized, and communicative, making the planning process efficient and stress-free. They have a keen eye for design, and their ability to incorporate the couple's wedding theme and colors into the stationery and gifting items is impeccable.

The quality of their products is outstanding. By Dami Studios creates beautifully crafted stationery, including save-the-dates, invitations, menus, and place cards, that exude elegance and sophistication. Each item is thoughtfully designed and meticulously executed, leaving a lasting impression on both the couple and their guests. Their personalized gifts, such as custom-made guest favors or welcome boxes, add a touch of luxury and warmth to the overall wedding experience.

Furthermore, By Dami Studios' professionalism and reliability are commendable. They deliver products on time and with utmost care, ensuring that everything is in perfect condition for the wedding day. Their attention to detail extends beyond the design aspect, as they carefully package and present each item, creating a memorable unboxing experience for the couple and their guests.
In conclusion, By Dami Studios is a highly recommended stationery and gifting company for any wedding planner. Their creativity, professionalism, and commitment to delivering exceptional products make them an invaluable partner in creating a cohesive and memorable wedding experience. I wholeheartedly endorse By Dami Studios for couples seeking beautifully designed stationery and personalized gifts that will elevate their special day.

originalText.text: Dami of By Dami Studios is amazing, her passion for her craft is unmatched.  She genuinely cares for her clients and only puts out the best! I've not only used her for invitations and stationary for personal events, but she is also the go to for all my clients.  I've also had the opportunity to be clutched by Dami and it literally was the perfect accessory for my ball gown, the clutch itself actually stole the show, so well made and sturdy and worth the price for sure because of all the detail that goes into making each custom clutch.  Dami will forever be #1 in my book!

originalText.text: Asking Dami to be a part of my wedding journey was one of the best decisions that we ever made for our wedding. She set tone for a fabulous evening. She took the time to understand what we were looking for without us having to say too much. The invitations were so great, we need the whole wedding suite to be done!! Greatest service ‚ù§Ô∏èThank you for the fu,  creative experience!

originalText.text:
I am so happy to have reached out to Dami for my wedding invites. Not only were they amazing, but she worked with my short timeframe and delivered the invites on time. I love her professionalism, while making you feel like she is your personal friend at the same time.

I didn't have a definite idea of what I wanted, which can be frustrating for creative minds who want to get a sense of what you're like. But she was patient enough to get certain details like my color preference and simple elegance down, and surprised me with the result.

She is also amazing with embellishments and customizing gifts. My sister gets tons of compliments whenever she rocks the clutch Dami blinged out as a gift from me for planning my wedding.

I will definitely use her for more unique and creative ideas in the future.
